trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Boswell
There were no other sightings in Boswell on or around July 28th 2011
divs: Sighting DetailsI have reported this and have been contacted by a man in mount pleasnt tx but he says he is only able to take care of events in texas he says I need a investigator from oklahoma. I can show this investigator any clear night from approx 9pm till 11:15 pm as that is the only time I see them. I need someone to come and see for themselves what I am seeing. I have been watching these since 1993 and have seen rare events take place. I have seen them in west texas east tx north tx oklahoma floridaThese are not airplanes nor are they satalites. planes do not do what these are doing. If you need to call me to set up a viewing please do so,I im in a dead spot for cell phone but my roomy can get cell phone service better than I can. I am in boswell oklahoma his phone number is 9034217388 ask for wayne. you will also be impressed as to what I can show you. I never play games. You will have to see for yourselves.
